wikitext.*:
'''''nestegi''''' is an [[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]] word meaning "insert, stick in". The past tense is said to be ''nestanc''.<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 388</ref>

[[Didier Willis]] has suggested that ''nestag-'' (retaining the same meaning) would be the valid [[Neo-Elvish|Neo-Sindarin]] form of the infinitive verb ''nestegi''.<ref>[[Didier Willis]], [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] at [http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com] (accessed 19 June 2011)</ref>

==Etymology==

The word derives from [[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]] ''nestak-'' ("insert, stick in"), from [[Sundocarme|root]] [[STAK]].<ref name=Ety/>
